title: Teemo Mushroom Bug
body:
This bug happens fairly often, about 1-3 times per game I play as Teemo. Whenever I place mushrooms in bushes, sometimes they randomly explode before their time expires. There are no invisible champions on the enemy team, no minions walked past it, it was just sitting there and exploded. When they do a little popup saying something like invincible pops up, i'm thinking it may have to do with ward rubble/residue from the new preseason. 
It may have to do with something like the residue counting as the same type of entity as champions and minions so when it appears it blows up the mushroom. This has only happened since that update. This is extremely aggravating since all they have to do is place a ward in a bush and then when it dies my mushroom also dies. If you could fix this asap.

replies.body:
They are aware that this bug is out there and they are working on it

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/GaxzBge0-teemo-rubble-pops-shrooms

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HIyHTEGV,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-11-23T22:32:38.619+0000)
>
> Thanks for linking this! :D

@Riot KateyKhaos: Do you have any idea on the timeframe within which to expect a fix for these Teemo shroom bugs? I just read the upcoming patch's notes and no mention. :( This bug, and the bug of not proccing spell-effects, have combined to eliminate a huge portion of Teemo's power.
I didn't personally work on this, so I'm a bit out of the loop. Looking over some stuff, it appears it's fixed in 5.23. If you're still seeing this, lemme know!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HIyHTEGV,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-24T20:01:39.099+0000)
>
> I didn't personally work on this, so I'm a bit out of the loop. Looking over some stuff, it appears it's fixed in 5.23. If you're still seeing this, lemme know!

Katey, 

His shrooms still don't seem to be proccing spell effects such as Deathfire Touch mastery, Liandry's, etc. correctly. I really appreciate your assistance on this, and wish you the happiest of Thanksgivings!

-Aaron
We're looking into this now - I believe they should, but I'm following up with gameplay today.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=HIyHTEGV,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-24T20:01:39.099+0000)
>
> I didn't personally work on this, so I'm a bit out of the loop. Looking over some stuff, it appears it's fixed in 5.23. If you're still seeing this, lemme know!

His shrooms still aren't proc'ing spell effects (Liandry's, Luden's, etc). Is this intended or is this a bug?
I was comfused when that happened to me as well.

this happened to me a few times. 




also upvoted for being a teemo thread! teemo is our lord and savior! all hail teemo!

Yup, this is definitely a thing, and I've noticed the rubble being the problem also.

RIOT PLS. Teemo{{champion:17}}  is already in an annoying spot.
